Tezpur - Kalibari Rajah Sahar | Dated: 21/09/2022. As reported by Tezpur Water Resource Division, Tezpur erosion is observed on the right bank of the Brahmaputra river at Kalibari Rajah Sahar village under Mahabhairab Mouza. Length: 100m ( approx, including the stretch as reported earlier on 09/09/2022 & 19/09/2022) | 0
